fields.description:
azure-conda-win-vs2017-py36-r36 (and azure-conda-win-vs2017-py37-r40, azure-conda-win-vs2017-py38, azure-conda-win-vs2017-py39) are affected by this new error

_Error: Got unexpected extra arguments (D:\bld\win-64\arrow-cpp-proc-3.1.0.dev834-cpu.tar.bz2 D:\bld\win-64\parquet-cpp-1.5.1-h57928b3_0.tar.bz2 D:\bld\win-64\pyarrow-3.1.0.dev834-py39hf9247be_0_cpu.tar.bz2 D:\bld\win-64\pyarrow-tests-3.1.0.dev834-py39hf9247be_0_cpu.tar.bz2)_
fields.summary: [CI] Fix arguments in Conda Windows builds
